Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: There is no judgment coming from AI and it allows you to clarify, ask for examples etc. which you do not have the time, confidence or patience to pry out of your teacher.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: Feedback had largely the same emotional effect

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Not really much difference only that teachers have the background context that you are studying a certain topic for a certain assessment/unit but you can easily take the time to provide this context to the AI as well although it is time consuming and the quality of feedback does not differ much at all.
